mapper.select: SELECT DEGCS_SVCCD , DEGCS_SVCNM , DEGCS_ENABLE_YN , DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE FROM DEGCS_DATA_PLAN ORDER BY DEGCS_SVC_CREATEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEGCS_DATA_PLAN (DEGCS_SVCCD, DEGCS_SVCNM, DEGCS_ENABLE_YN, DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE, DEGCS_SVC_CREATEDATE) VALUES(#{svcCd}, #{svcNm}, #{enableYn}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE DEGCS_DATA_PLAN SET DEGCS_SVCNM = #{svcNm}, DEGCS_ENABLE_YN = #{enableYn}, DEGCS_SVC_UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE DEGCS_SVCCD = #{svcCd}
